title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 437.6 - Alienation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 437.6 - Alienation

State Regulations

Facilities acquired or developed by a municipality
pursuant to this Part shall not be sold or disposed of or used for other than
public park purposes without the express authority of an act of the

Legislature, which shall provide for the substitution of other lands of equal
fair market value and reasonably equivalent usefulness and location to those to
be discontinued, sold or disposed of, and such other requirements as shall be
approved by the commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
437.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
